description: Europeans face a blizzard of restrictions on their freedoms as authorities try to stop the spread.
title: Coronavirus capital by capital: How are Europeans coping with shutdown?
title_page: Coronavirus capital by capital: How are Europeans coping with shutdown? - BBC News
maintext: I peer out of my window to see how long the queue is for the supermarket next door. If it's more than 10 people, that could mean a half-hour wait to be let in one by one. As it happens, it's shorter, so I nip down.
